lines: Ula kanana mu moyo, Mumvwe jwi lyakwe Jesu.
Lwiimbo lubotu lwakwe, Mu mulaka utafwi,
Zibi wazilekelela, Mumvwe jwi lyakwe Jesu,
Koya Ôkumuna kujulu, Nsame musyinÕ a Jesu.
Alumbwe mwana mbelele, Ndakondwa muli Jesu,
Ndali yanda elyo zina lya Mufutuli Jesu.
Ligusya kuyowa Ôbubi, Zina lya Mwami Jesu,
Moyo wangu ula yanda, Kumvwa zina lya Jesu.
Naya kuleta musyini, Wabuumi a bulemu,
